headlines.headline: Why David Dennis Jr. doesn't believe in the Lakers
headlines.description: David Dennis Jr. shares his concerns about the Lakers after their win over the Mavericks.

headlines.headline: Top trends from last Patriots-Broncos AFC Championship Game
headlines.description: Before New England and Denver battle to play in Super Bowl LX, here's a look back at sports and pop culture trends that dominated that last matchup.

headlines.headline: Sam Darnold set for NFC Championship Game despite lingering injury
headlines.description: Seahawks quarterback Sam Darnold will start Sunday's NFC Championship Game, but he and Drew Lock split reps at practice last week due to Darnold's lingering oblique injury.

headlines.headline: NFL conference championship uniforms for Broncos, Rams, Pats, Seahawks
headlines.description: Teams in the NFL conference championship games will be suited accordingly on the field.

headlines.headline: Sources: Broncos' Bo Nix sidelined 12 weeks after ankle surgery
headlines.description: Broncos quarterback Bo Nix is expected to be sidelined 12 weeks after undergoing surgery last week on his broken right ankle, sources told ESPN.

headlines.headline: McDavid scores in OT, Bouchard nets hat trick as Oilers edge Capitals 6-5
headlines.description: Connor McDavid scored 46 seconds into overtime, Evan Bouchard had his first NHL hat trick and three assists, and the Edmonton Oilers held on for a 6-5 win over the Washington Capitals on Saturday night.
